entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @atiku @nmanigeria Oga, the deceased doctor was a Private Physician who was treating a Covid-19 patient in an unauthorized private hospital, the issue of inadequate PPE doesn't arise here. Every suspected case SHOULD be reported to @NCDCgov @Fmohnigeria or the various State health departments.
